fields.description: Titanium.XML apiXmlAttr please investigate the failure. Please use https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/tree/TIMOB-24816 to find the related testYou can use https://github.com/ewanharris/mocha-test to quickly debug (most) mocha tests)
fields.summary: Windows: Mocha test Titanium.XML apiXmlAttr test failure

comments.body:
https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/blob/4b75b3f057ad8771bc0d0f2ebf249096462a9207/Resources/ti.xml.test.js#L1066

attr.value === undefined 

"error":{"name":"AssertionError","expected":"","operator":"to be","message":"expected undefined to be ''","generatedMessage":true,"stack":"/should.js:1411:20
/your-test.js:88:30
run@/ti-mocha.js:4363:19
runTest@/ti-mocha.js:4768:13
/ti-mocha.js:4846:19
next@/ti-mocha.js:4693:16
/ti-mocha.js:4703:11
next@/ti-mocha.js:4641:25
/ti-mocha.js:4670:9
timeslice@/ti-mocha.js:5777:27","showDiff":true}}

Per spec this should be a string by default, not undefined https://www.w3.org/TR/dom/#attr Attributes have a namespace (null or a non-empty string), namespace prefix (null or a non-empty string), local name (a non-empty string), name (a non-empty string), *value (a string),* and element (null or an element).
